item.annihilationblade.desc.line1: "When the stars fall silent, only this blade continues to sing."
item.annihilationblade.desc.line2: "Forged not from mortal metal, but from causality and the void itself."
item.annihilationblade.desc.line3: "It severs not flesh, but the laws that bind existence."
item.annihilationblade.desc.line4: "To wield it is to grasp the end of all things."
item.annihilationblade.annihilation_frag: Used to craft the Annihilation Core
